ISSUE.TITLE: Some containers require RequestWrapper extend ServletRequestWrapper or HttpServletRequestWrapper
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: WAS Liberty https://github.com/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-netflix/issues/958 See also https://github.com/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-netflix/issues/397 Looks like changing https://github.com/Netflix/zuul/blob/1.x/zuul-core/src/main/java/com/netflix/zuul/http/HttpServletRequestWrapper.java#L58 to `public class HttpServletRequestWrapper extends ServletRequestWrapper implements HttpServletRequest` Would have the desired outcome.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #212 from ghenkes/remove-turbine Remove unused turbine-core dependency

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Zuul HttpServletRequestWrapper now extends javax HttpServletRequestWrapper. Allows for certain containers that require it to not fail with an exception. fixes gh-213
